Description: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency announced that Argos USA LLC and Lehigh Cement Company settled alleged Clean Air Act violations at a portland cement manufacturing facility in Martinsburg, West Virginia.
Agency: Environmental Protection Agency referral to the Justice Department
Info Source: https://www.epa.gov/newsreleases/owners-portland-cement-plant-martinsburg-west-virginia-pay-more-15-million-penalty-air
https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_summary.php
Notes: Company is plan administrator. Penalty amount reported in range of $10,001 to $50,000.

Info Source: https://www.justice.gov/opa/pr/ready-mix-concrete-company-admits-fixing-prices-and-rigging-bids-violation-antitrust-laws
